txt.en:
'If you are to enter the School at Tham Mírdain, I beseech you to seek out whatever remnants of the great knowledge held within you may find. There may be nothing remaining therein or there may be some scrap of knowledge that seems to be naught, but if there is even the least of scraps, the Enemy must not be allowed to obtain it.

'What knowledge might remain in the School would be held within the main hall, where all would come to listen to the discourse presented by the greatest crafters of Eregion.

'Seek out this knowledge and bring whatever you find there to me.'

'Most excellent, [placeholder], though there seems to be little of great importance here. However, there is some history of Eregion, and this is enough to see that this deed was one worthwhile and necessary.\n\n'You are thanked well for your efforts.'
'Please, search the ruins of the School at Tham Mírdain for whatever knowledge may still be held within the walls of that once noble place.'

If you are to enter the School at Tham Mírdain, I beseech you to seek out whatever remnants of the great knowledge held within you may find. There may be nothing remaining therein or there may be some scrap of knowledge that seems to be naught, but if there is even the least of scraps, the Enemy must not be allowed to obtain it.

What knowledge might remain in the School would be held within the main hall, where all would come to listen to the discourse presented by the greatest crafters of Eregion.

Seek out this knowledge and bring whatever you find there to me.

The School at Tham Mírdain lies to the east, up a small incline from the northern slopes of Echad Mirobel.\n\nEvil threatens to claim the lost knowledge of Eregion, and it falls to you to recover this knowledge before it is truly lost forever. Faellien has asked you to bring any scraps of knowledge you find back to Echad Mirobel.
